name: Zero Conflict TD
description:
Prepare for an out-of-this-world gaming experience in "Zero Conflict TD," the ultimate tower defense game that pits you against a relentless alien invasion! The fate of Earth hangs in the balance, and it's up to you to lead the charge and protect our planet from these extraterrestrial aggressors.

In a not-so-distant future, humanity has made contact with advanced civilizations among the stars. While most alien races are peaceful, a malevolent force known as the Ximarats has set its sights on Earth, seeking to conquer and exploit our precious resources. With their technologically superior weapons and relentless onslaught, they pose a formidable threat.

As the commander of Earth's last line of defense, you'll embark on an epic journey to save our world. Your mission is to strategically place an array of powerful towers, each with unique weapons, across key locations on the planet. These towers will serve as your primary means of thwarting the alien invasion.
